articles.title: IND vs PAK, Colombo Live Weather Update: Bright and Sunny near R Premadasa - India TV News
articles.description: India vs Pakistan Live Weather Forecast and Updates from Colombo: The Rohit Sharma-led side will take on Babar Azam's Pakistan in a Super Four clash of the ongoing Asia Cup. Here are the live weather updates from Colombo.
articles.content: Welcome to our live coverage of the weather updates from Colombo, Sri Lanka ahead of the Pakistan vs India Asia Cup Super Four match. After the previous contest between the two sides on September 2 g… [+389 chars]
